The render() function will be called when the GtkGLArea is ready for you to draw its content:
trans-unit.target: 该 render() 时，该函数将被称为GtkGLArea是为你准备好绘制它的内容：

trans-unit.source: The GtkBitset structure contains only private data.
trans-unit.target: 该 GtkBitset 结构只包含私人数据。

trans-unit.source: The GtkExpression structure contains only private data.
trans-unit.target: 该 GtkExpression 结构只包含私人数据。

trans-unit.source: The GtkGLAreaClass structure contains only private data.
trans-unit.target: 该 GtkGLAreaClass 结构只包含私人数据。

trans-unit.source: The GtkLayoutManagerClass structure contains only private data, and should only be accessed through the provided API, or when subclassing GtkLayoutManager.
trans-unit.target: 该 GtkLayoutManagerClass 结构只包含私人数据，并且只能通过所提供的API来访问，或继承时GtkLayoutManager。

trans-unit.source: The GtkNotebookPage structure only contains private data.
trans-unit.target: 该 GtkNotebookPage 结构只包含私人数据。

trans-unit.source: The calc() notation adds considerable expressive power. There are limits on what types can be combined in such an expression (e.g. it does not make sense to add a number and a time). For the full details, see the CSS3 VAlues and Units spec.
trans-unit.target: 该 calc() 符号增加了相当大的表现力。在此表达式中可以组合哪些类型有限制（例如，添加数字和时间没有意义）。有关完整的详细信息，请参见CSS3 VAlues and Units规范。

trans-unit.source: The debugoptimized build type is the default for GTK if no build type is specified when calling meson.
trans-unit.target: 该 debugoptimized 构建类型是GTK默认值，如果调用时没有指定构建类型介子。

trans-unit.source: The gtk-cursor-theme-size setting is ignored, GTK will use the cursor size that Windows tells it to use.
trans-unit.target: 在 gtk-cursor-theme-size 设置将被忽略，GTK将使用光标大小的Windows告诉它使用。

trans-unit.source: The gtk4-demo application that comes with GTK contains more example code for GtkTextView.
trans-unit.target: GTK随附的 gtk4-demo 应用程序包含GtkTextView的更多示例代码。

trans-unit.source: The loaders.cache file is generated by the gdk-pixbuf-query-loaders utility.
trans-unit.target: 该 loaders.cache 文件由产生 gdk-pixbuf-query-loaders 工具。

trans-unit.source: The plain build type provided by Meson should only be used when packaging GTK, and it’s expected that packagers will provide their own compiler flags when building GTK. See the previous section for the list of environment variables to be used to define compiler and linker flags. Note that with the plain build type, you are also responsible for controlling the debugging features of GTK with -DG_ENABLE_DEBUG and -DG_DISABLE_CAST_CHECKS.
trans-unit.target: Meson提供的 plain 构建类型仅应在打包GTK时使用，并且期望打包程序在构建GTK时会提供自己的编译器标志。有关用于定义编译器和链接器标志的环境变量的列表，请参见上一节。请注意，对于普通构建类型，您还负责使用 -DG_ENABLE_DEBUG 和 -DG_DISABLE_CAST_CHECKS 控制GTK的调试功能。

trans-unit.source: The preview command accepts the following options:
trans-unit.target: 该 preview 命令接受以下选项：

trans-unit.source: The release build type will disable debugging code paths and additional run time safeties, like checked casts for object instances.
trans-unit.target: 所述 release 生成类型将禁用调试代码路径和附加运行时间安全装置，像对象实例检查铸件。

trans-unit.source: The simplify command accepts the following options:
trans-unit.target: 的 simplify 命令接受以下选项：

trans-unit.source: The test accessibility backend is recommended for test suites and remote continuous integration pipelines.
trans-unit.target: 建议将 test 可访问性后端用于测试套件和远程连续集成管道。

trans-unit.source: The action parameter to gtk_print_operation_run() determines what action the print operation should perform.
trans-unit.target: gtk_print_operation_run() 的 action 参数确定打印操作应执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: The backlog is provided in chronological order.
The bytes and line_bytes offsets are meant to be used to programmatically match data. The lines and line_chars offsets can be used for printing the location in a file.
trans-unit.target: 的 bytes 和 line_bytes 偏移意味着被用于以编程匹配数据。的 lines 和 line_chars 偏移可以用于在文件打印的位置。

trans-unit.source: The callback will be called when the launch is completed. It should call gtk_show_uri_full_finish() to obtain the result.
trans-unit.target: 该 callback 完成启动时会被调用。它应该调用 gtk_show_uri_full_finish() 以获得结果。

trans-unit.source: The child widget must be a child of the widget using manager .
trans-unit.target: 在 child 的小工具必须使用控件的子 manager 。

trans-unit.source: The column is the column of the model to get a value from, and the attribute is the parameter on cell to be set from the value. So for example if column 2 of the model contains strings, you could have the “text” attribute of a GtkCellRendererText get its values from column 2.
trans-unit.target: 该 column 是要从中获取值的模型的列，而 attribute 是要从该值设置的 cell 上的参数。因此，例如，如果模型的第2列包含字符串，则可以让GtkCellRendererText的“ text”属性从第2列获取其值。

trans-unit.source: The context is bound to the area prior to emitting this function, and the buffers are painted to the window once the emission terminates.
trans-unit.target: 所述 context 被绑定到 area 发射该功能之前，和缓冲器被绘到窗口一旦发射终止。

trans-unit.source: The display in use may influence the resulting string in various forms, such as resolving hardware keycodes or by causing display-specific modifier names.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的 display 可能会以各种形式影响生成的字符串，例如解析硬件键码或导致显示特定的修饰符名称。

trans-unit.source: The filter_func will be called for each child after the call, and it will continue to be called each time a child changes (via gtk_flow_box_child_changed()) or when gtk_flow_box_invalidate_filter() is called.
trans-unit.target: 该 filter_func 将被称为呼叫后，每个孩子，它会继续每次被称为孩子的变化（通过 gtk_flow_box_child_changed() ），或者当 gtk_flow_box_invalidate_filter() 被调用。

trans-unit.source: The filter_func will be called for each row after the call, and it will continue to be called each time a row changes (via gtk_list_box_row_changed()) or when gtk_list_box_invalidate_filter() is called.
trans-unit.target: 该 filter_func 将被称为呼叫后的每一行，并将继续每次被称为行更改（通过 gtk_list_box_row_changed() ），或者当 gtk_list_box_invalidate_filter() 被调用。

trans-unit.source: The first_property_name argument and subsequent arguments are a list of properties to set on the tag, as with g_object_set().
trans-unit.target: 的 first_property_name 参数和随后的参数是在标签属性组的列表，与 g_object_set() 。

trans-unit.source: The layout acquires the ownership of constraint after calling this function.
trans-unit.target: 在 layout 取得所有权 constraint 调用此函数后。

trans-unit.source: The layout acquires the ownership of guide after calling this function.
trans-unit.target: 在 layout 取得所有权 guide 调用此函数后。

trans-unit.source: The parameter must match the parameter_type of the action.
The path , column , cell_x and cell_y arguments will be filled in likewise as for gtk_tree_view_get_path_at_pos(). Please see gtk_tree_view_get_path_at_pos() for more information.
trans-unit.target: 的 path ， column ， cell_x 和 cell_y 参数将在同样作为被填充为 gtk_tree_view_get_path_at_pos() 。请参阅 gtk_tree_view_get_path_at_pos() 了解更多信息。

trans-unit.source: The renderer is packed after (away from end of) any other GtkCellRenderer packed with reference to the end of box .
trans-unit.target: 相对于 box 的结尾，在打包任何其他GtkCellRenderer之后（远离结尾）打包 renderer 。

trans-unit.source: The renderer is packed after any other GtkCellRenderer packed with reference to the start of box .
trans-unit.target: 参照 box 的开始，将 renderer 打包在任何其他GtkCellRenderer打包之后。

trans-unit.source: The signal_id must have been registered with g_signal_new() or g_signal_newv() before calling this function.
trans-unit.target: 在调用此函数之前， signal_id 必须已在 g_signal_new() 或 g_signal_newv() 中注册。

trans-unit.source: The signal_name of widget_type must have been registered with g_signal_new() or g_signal_newv() before calling this function.
trans-unit.target: 该 signal_name 的 widget_type 必须已经注册 g_signal_new() 或 g_signal_newv() 调用此函数之前。

trans-unit.source: The sort_column_id of the model to sort on.

The sort_func will be called for each child after the call, and will continue to be called each time a child changes (via gtk_flow_box_child_changed()) and when gtk_flow_box_invalidate_sort() is called.
trans-unit.target: 该 sort_func 将被称为呼叫后，每个孩子，并会继续每一个孩子（通过改变时间被称为 gtk_flow_box_child_changed() ），当 gtk_flow_box_invalidate_sort() 被调用。

trans-unit.source: The sort_func will be called for each row after the call, and will continue to be called each time a row changes (via gtk_list_box_row_changed()) and when gtk_list_box_invalidate_sort() is called.
trans-unit.target: 该 sort_func 将被称为呼叫后的每一行，并继续每一个行（通过改变时间被称为 gtk_list_box_row_changed() ），当 gtk_list_box_invalidate_sort() 被调用。

trans-unit.source: The string will be copied. See gtk_string_list_take() for a way to avoid that.
trans-unit.target: 该 string 将被复制。有关避免这种情况的方法，请参见 gtk_string_list_take() 。

trans-unit.source: The tag is still valid by the time the signal is emitted, but it is not associated with a tag table any more.
trans-unit.target: 该 tag 仍然是由信号发出时有效，但它不与标签表中的任何更多的关联。

trans-unit.source: The take_args argument is a block of data to use for uniform arguments, as per types and offsets defined by the shader . Normally this is generated by gsk_gl_shader_format_args() or GskGLShaderArgBuilder. The snapshotter takes ownership of take_args , so the caller should not free it after this.
trans-unit.target: 所述 take_args 参数是数据块以用于均匀参数，如每由定义的类型和偏移 shader 。通常，这是由 gsk_gl_shader_format_args() 或GskGLShaderArgBuilder生成的。快照程序拥有 take_args 的所有权，因此调用者不应在此之后释放它。

trans-unit.source: The update_header can look at the current header widget using gtk_list_box_row_get_header() and either update the state of the widget as needed, or set a new one using gtk_list_box_row_set_header(). If no header is needed, set the header to NULL.
trans-unit.target: 所述 update_header 可以查看当前报头插件使用 gtk_list_box_row_get_header() 和更新该窗口小部件的状态根据需要，或者设置一个新的使用 gtk_list_box_row_set_header() 。如果不需要头，则将头设置为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: The update_header function will be called for each row after the call, and it will continue to be called each time a row changes (via gtk_list_box_row_changed()) and when the row before changes (either by gtk_list_box_row_changed() on the previous row, or when the previous row becomes a different row). It is also called for all rows when gtk_list_box_invalidate_headers() is called.
trans-unit.target: update_header 函数将在调用后为每一行调用，并且每当一行更改时（通过 gtk_list_box_row_changed() ）以及更改前一行的时间（通过上一行的 gtk_list_box_row_changed() 或何时更改）将继续调用该函数。前一行变成另一行）。调用 gtk_list_box_invalidate_headers() 时，也会为所有行调用该函数。

trans-unit.source: The views dictionary is used to match GtkConstraintTargets to the symbolic view name inside the VFL.
trans-unit.target: 的 views 字典用于匹配GtkConstraintTargets到VFL内部符号视图名。

trans-unit.source: The x and y coordinate that are provided must be relative to bin_window coordinates. Widget-relative coordinates must be converted using gtk_tree_view_convert_widget_to_bin_window_coords().
trans-unit.target: 提供的 x 和 y 坐标必须相对于bin_window坐标。相对于小部件的坐标必须使用 gtk_tree_view_convert_widget_to_bin_window_coords() 进行转换。

trans-unit.source: The View is composed of the first three objects, while the last is the Model. One of the prime benefits of the MVC design is that multiple views can be created of a single model. For example, a model mapping the file system could be created for a file manager. Many views could be created to display various parts of the file system, but only one copy need be kept in memory.
trans-unit.target: 该视图是由前三个对象，而最后是模型。MVC设计的主要好处之一是可以为一个模型创建多个视图。例如，可以为文件管理器创建映射文件系统的模型。可以创建许多视图来显示文件系统的各个部分，但仅一个副本需要保留在内存中。

trans-unit.source: The gtk-doc package is used to generate the reference documentation included with GTK. By default support for gtk-doc is disabled because it requires various extra dependencies to be installed. If you have gtk-doc and pandoc installed and are modifying GTK, you may want to enable gtk-doc support by passing in -Dgtk_doc=true.
trans-unit.target: 的GTK-doc的包被用于产生包含GTK的参考文档。默认情况下，对gtk-doc的支持是禁用的，因为它需要安装各种额外的依赖项。如果已安装gtk-doc和pandoc并正在修改GTK，则可能需要通过传递 -Dgtk_doc=true 来启用gtk-doc支持。

trans-unit.source: The API of GtkInfoBar is very similar to GtkDialog, allowing you to add buttons to the action area with gtk_info_bar_add_button() or gtk_info_bar_new_with_buttons(). The sensitivity of action widgets can be controlled with gtk_info_bar_set_response_sensitive().
trans-unit.target: GtkInfoBar的API与GtkDialog非常相似，允许您使用 gtk_info_bar_add_button() 或 gtk_info_bar_new_with_buttons() 将按钮添加到操作区域。动作小部件的敏感性可以通过 gtk_info_bar_set_response_sensitive() 进行控制。

trans-unit.source: The Apache License, version 2.0
The Apple macOS port of GTK is an implementation of GDK (and therefore GTK) on top of the Quartz API.
trans-unit.target: GTK的Apple macOS移植是在Quartz API之上的GDK(也就是GTK)的实现。

trans-unit.source: The Artistic License, version 2.0
The BSD standard license
The CSS node for a context menu is added as a subnode below text as well.
trans-unit.target: 将上下文菜单的CSS节点也添加为文本下方的子节点。

trans-unit.source: The CSS nodes of a GtkScale
The Cancel button will only be shown if the page isn’t “committed”. See gtk_assistant_commit() for details.
trans-unit.target: 仅当页面不是“已提交”时，才会显示“取消”按钮。有关详细信息，请参见 gtk_assistant_commit() 。

trans-unit.source: The Events phase is a stretch of time between each redraw where GTK processes input events from the user and other events (like e.g. network I/O). Some events, like mouse motion are compressed so that only a single mouse motion event per clock cycle needs to be handled.
trans-unit.target: 事件阶段是每次重绘之间的一段时间,在这段时间里,GTK会处理来自用户的输入事件和其他事件(比如网络I/O)。有些事件,如鼠标运动被压缩,所以每个时钟周期只需要处理一个鼠标运动事件.

trans-unit.source: The GDK Broadway backend provides support for displaying GTK applications in a web browser, using HTML5 and web sockets. To run your application in this way, select the Broadway backend by setting GDK_BACKEND=broadway. Then you can make your application appear in a web browser by pointing it at http://127.0.0.1:8080. Note that you need to enable web sockets in your web browser.
trans-unit.target: GDK Broadway后端支持使用HTML5和Web套接字在Web浏览器中显示GTK应用程序。要以这种方式运行您的应用程序，请通过设置 GDK_BACKEND=broadway 选择百老汇后端。然后，可以通过将其指向 http://127.0.0.1:8080 来使您的应用程序出现在Web浏览器中。请注意，您需要在Web浏览器中启用Web套接字。

trans-unit.source: The GDK Wayland backend provides support for running GTK applications under a Wayland compositor. To run your application in this way, select the Wayland backend by setting GDK_BACKEND=wayland.
trans-unit.target: GDK Wayland后端为在Wayland合成器下运行GTK应用程序提供支持。要以这种方式运行您的应用程序，请通过设置 GDK_BACKEND=wayland 选择Wayland后端。

trans-unit.source: The GDK manual covers
The GError domain for GtkRecentManager errors.
The GFile displayed by self .
The GFile that is displayed or NULL if none.
The GFile used by the GtkAppChooserDialog. The dialog's GtkAppChooserWidget content type will be guessed from the file, if present.
trans-unit.target: GtkAppChooserDialog使用的GFile。对话框的GtkAppChooserWidget内容类型将从文件中推测出来（如果存在）。

trans-unit.source: The GFileInfos in the list have some attributes in the recent namespace added: recent::private (boolean) and recent:applications (stringv).
trans-unit.target: 列表中的GFileInfos在最近的命名空间中增加了一些属性:最近的::private(boolean)和最近的:applications(stringv)。

trans-unit.source: The GFileInfos returned from a GtkDirectoryList have the "standard::file" attribute set to the GFile they refer to. This way you can get at the file that is referred to in the same way you would via g_file_enumerator_get_child(). This means you do not need access to the GtkDirectoryList but can access the GFile directly from the GFileInfo when operating with a GtkListView or similar.
trans-unit.target: 从GtkDirectoryList返回的GFileInfos将“ standard :: file”属性设置为它们所引用的GFile。这样，您可以获取与通过 g_file_enumerator_get_child() 相同的方式引用的文件。这意味着您不需要访问GtkDirectoryList，但是在使用GtkListView或类似工具进行操作时可以直接从GFileInfo访问GFile 。

trans-unit.source: The GIcon displayed in the GtkImage. For themed icons, If the icon theme is changed, the image will be updated automatically.
trans-unit.target: GtkImage中显示的GIcon。对于主题图标,如果图标主题发生变化,图像将自动更新。

trans-unit.source: The GIcon representing the icon to display. If the icon theme is changed, the image will be updated automatically.
trans-unit.target: 代表要显示的图标的 GIcon。如果图标主题发生变化,图像将自动更新。

trans-unit.source: The GIcon to use for the primary icon for the entry.
The GIcon to use for the secondary icon for the entry.
The GL context for the area is guaranteed to be current when this signal is emitted.
trans-unit.target: 当该信号发出时,保证该区域的GL上下文是当前的。

trans-unit.source: The GLib library provides core non-graphical functionality such as high level data types, Unicode manipulation, and an object and type system to C programs. It is available from here.
trans-unit.target: GLib库提供了核心的非图形功能，例如高级数据类型，Unicode操作以及C程序的对象和类型系统。从这里可以得到。

trans-unit.source: The GListModel to use as root.
The GMenuModel for the menubar.
The GMenuModel from which the menu bar is created.
The GMenuModel from which the popup will be created.
trans-unit.target: 创建弹出式菜单的GM菜单模型。

trans-unit.source: The GPermission object controlling this button.
trans-unit.target: 控制该按钮的GP权限对象。

trans-unit.source: The GQuark used for GtkIconThemeError errors.
The GTK_TREE_SORTABLE_DEFAULT_SORT_COLUMN_ID can be used to make a GtkTreeSortable use the default sort function.
trans-unit.target: GTK_TREE_SORTABLE_DEFAULT_SORT_COLUMN_ID可用于使GtkTreeSortable使用默认的排序功能。

trans-unit.source: The GTK_TREE_SORTABLE_UNSORTED_SORT_COLUMN_ID can be used to make a GtkTreeSortable use no sorting.
The GType to get a template child for
trans-unit.target: 要获取模板子类型的GT类型

trans-unit.source: The GTypes of the columns.
The GValue will acquire a reference to the expression .

The GtkAboutDialog offers a simple way to display information about a program like its logo, name, copyright, website and license. It is also possible to give credits to the authors, documenters, translators and artists who have worked on the program. An about dialog is typically opened when the user selects the About option from the Help menu. All parts of the dialog are optional.
trans-unit.target: GtkAboutDialog提供了一种简单的方法来显示有关程序的信息，例如其徽标，名称，版权，网站和许可证。也可以对参与该计划的作者，文档撰写者，翻译者和艺术家予以赞扬。当用户从“ Help 菜单中选择“ About 选项时，通常会打开一个“关于”对话框。对话框的所有部分都是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The GtkAdjustment for the horizontal position.
The GtkAdjustment for the vertical position.
The GtkAdjustment that contains the current value of this range object.
trans-unit.target: 包含该范围对象当前值的GtkAdjustment。

trans-unit.source: The GtkAdjustment that contains the current value of this scale button object.
trans-unit.target: 包含该比例按钮对象当前值的GtkAdjustment。

trans-unit.source: The GtkAdjustment that contains the current value of this scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: 包含该滚动条当前值的GtkAdjustment。

trans-unit.source: The GtkAssistant implementation of the GtkBuildable interface exposes the action_area as internal children with the name “action_area”.
trans-unit.target: GtkBuildable接口的GtkAssistant实现将action_area作为内部子 action_area 公开，名称为“ action_area”。

trans-unit.source: The GtkBox is created with gtk_box_new() which takes a GtkOrientation enum as parameter. The buttons which this box will contain can either be laid out horizontally or vertically. This does not matter in this particular case, as we are dealing with only one button. After initializing box with the newly created GtkBox, the code adds the box widget to the window widget using gtk_window_set_child().
trans-unit.target: GtkBox是使用 gtk_box_new() 创建的，它以GtkOrientation枚举为参数。此框将包含的按钮可以水平或垂直放置。在这种特殊情况下，这无关紧要，因为我们只处理一个按钮。在使用新创建的GtkBox初始化box之后，代码使用 gtk_window_set_child() 将box小部件添加到窗口小部件中。

trans-unit.source: The GtkBox widget arranges child widgets into a single row or column, depending upon the value of its “orientation” property. Within the other dimension, all children are allocated the same size. Of course, the “halign” and “valign” properties can be used on the children to influence their allocation.
trans-unit.target: GtkBox窗口小部件将子窗口小部件排列为一行或一列，具体取决于其“方向”属性的值。在另一个维度内，所有子项都分配有相同的大小。当然，可以在子级上使用“ halign”和“ valign”属性来影响其分配。

trans-unit.source: The GtkBuildable interface is implemented by all widgets and many of the non-widget objects that are provided by GTK. The main user of this interface is GtkBuilder. There should be very little need for applications to call any of these functions directly.
trans-unit.target: GtkBuildable接口由GTK提供的所​​有小部件和许多非小部件对象实现。该界面的主要用户是GtkBuilder。应用程序几乎不需要直接调用这些函数中的任何一个。

trans-unit.source: The GtkBuilder data.
The GtkCenterBox implementation of the GtkBuildable interface supports placing children in the 3 positions by specifying “start”, “center” or “end” as the “type” attribute of a <child> element.
trans-unit.target: 通过将“开始”，“中心”或“结束”指定为<child>元素的“ type”属性，GtkBuildable接口的GtkCenterBox实现支持将子级放置在3个位置。

trans-unit.source: The GtkCenterBox widget arranges three children in a horizontal or vertical arrangement, keeping the middle child centered as well as possible.
trans-unit.target: GtkCenterBox widget以水平或垂直排列的方式排列三个子代,尽可能保持中间子代居中。

trans-unit.source: The GtkComboBox uses the model-view pattern; the list of valid choices is specified in the form of a tree model, and the display of the choices can be adapted to the data in the model by using cell renderers, as you would in a tree view. This is possible since GtkComboBox implements the GtkCellLayout interface. The tree model holding the valid choices is not restricted to a flat list, it can be a real tree, and the popup will reflect the tree structure.
trans-unit.target: GtkComboBox使用模型视图模式；有效选择列表以树模型的形式指定，并且可以像在树状视图中那样使用单元格渲染器将选择的显示适应模型中的数据。这是可能的，因为GtkComboBox实现了GtkCellLayout接口。拥有有效选择的树模型不限于平面列表，它可以是真实的树，并且弹出窗口将反映树的结构。

trans-unit.source: The GtkComboBoxText implementation of the GtkBuildable interface supports adding items directly using the <items> element and specifying <item> elements for each item. Each <item> element can specify the “id” corresponding to the appended text and also supports the regular translation attributes “translatable”, “context” and “comments”.
trans-unit.target: GtkBuildable接口的GtkComboBoxText实现支持直接使用<items>元素添加项目，并为每个项目指定<item>元素。每个<item>元素都可以指定与附加文本相对应的“ id”，并且还支持常规翻译属性“ translateable”，“ context”和“ comments”。

trans-unit.source: The GtkConstraintTarget interface is implemented by objects that can be used as source or target in GtkConstraints. Besides GtkWidget, it is also implemented by GtkConstraintGuide.
trans-unit.target: GtkConstraintTarget接口由可以在GtkConstraints中用作源或目标的对象实现。除了GtkWidget之外，它还由GtkConstraintGuide实现。

trans-unit.source: The GtkDialog implementation of the GtkBuildable interface exposes the content_area and action_area as internal children with the names “content_area” and “action_area”.
trans-unit.target: 该GtkDialog贯彻GtkBuildable接口暴露 content_area 和 action_area 与名称“content_area”和“action_area”内的孩子。

trans-unit.source: The GtkDropTarget::drop signal will

The GtkEntry implementation of the GtkBuildable interface supports a custom <attributes> element, which supports any number of <attribute> elements. The <attribute> element has attributes named “name“, “value“, “start“ and “end“ and allows you to specify PangoAttribute values for this label.
trans-unit.target: GtkBuildable接口的GtkEntry实现支持自定义的<attributes>元素，该元素支持任意数量的<attribute>元素。<attribute>元素具有名为“ name”，“ value”，“ start”和“ end”的属性，并允许您为此标签指定PangoAttribute值。

trans-unit.source: The GtkExpander implementation of the GtkBuildable interface supports placing a child in the label position by specifying “label” as the “type” attribute of a <child> element. A normal content child can be specified without specifying a <child> type attribute.
trans-unit.target: 通过将“ label”指定为<child>元素的“ type”属性，GtkBuildable接口的GtkExpander实现支持将子级放置在标签位置。可以在不指定<child> type属性的情况下指定普通内容子级。

trans-unit.source: The GtkFileFilter implementation of the GtkBuildable interface supports adding rules using the <mime-types> and <patterns> elements and listing the rules within. Specifying a <mime-type> or <pattern> has the same effect as as calling gtk_file_filter_add_mime_type() or gtk_file_filter_add_pattern().
trans-unit.target: GtkBuildable接口的GtkFileFilter实现支持使用<mime-types>和<patterns>元素添加规则并在其中列出规则。指定<mime-type>或<pattern>与调用 gtk_file_filter_add_mime_type() 或 gtk_file_filter_add_pattern() 具有相同的效果。

trans-unit.source: The GtkFontChooserDialog implementation of the GtkBuildable interface exposes the buttons with the names “select_button” and “cancel_button”.
trans-unit.target: GtkBuildable接口的GtkFontChooserDialog实现公开了名称为“ select_button”和“ cancel_button”的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The GtkFrame implementation of the GtkBuildable interface supports placing a child in the label position by specifying “label” as the “type” attribute of a <child> element. A normal content child can be specified without specifying a <child> type attribute.
trans-unit.target: 通过将“ label”指定为<child>元素的“ type”属性，GtkBuildable接口的GtkFrame实现支持将子级放置在标签位置。可以在不指定<child> type属性的情况下指定普通内容子级。

trans-unit.source: The GtkHeaderBar implementation of the GtkBuildable interface supports adding children at the start or end sides by specifying “start” or “end” as the “type” attribute of a <child> element, or setting the title widget by specifying “title” value.
trans-unit.target: GtkBuildable接口的GtkHeaderBar实现支持通过在<child>元素的“ type”属性中指定“ start”或“ end”，或通过指定“ title”值来设置标题小部件，从而在开头或结尾添加子项。

trans-unit.source: The GtkInfoBar implementation of the GtkBuildable interface exposes the content area and action area as internal children with the names “content_area” and “action_area”.
trans-unit.target: GtkBuildable接口的GtkInfoBar实现将内容区域和操作区域作为内部子项公开，名称分别为“ content_area”和“ action_area”。

trans-unit.source: The GtkLabel implementation of the GtkBuildable interface supports a custom <attributes> element, which supports any number of <attribute> elements. The <attribute> element has attributes named “name“, “value“, “start“ and “end“ and allows you to specify PangoAttribute values for this label.
trans-unit.target: GtkBuildable接口的GtkLabel实现支持自定义的<attributes>元素，该元素支持任意数量的<attribute>元素。<attribute>元素具有名为“ name”，“ value”，“ start”和“ end”的属性，并允许您为此标签指定PangoAttribute值。

trans-unit.source: The GtkLevelBar implementation of the GtkBuildable interface supports a custom <offsets> element, which can contain any number of <offset> elements, each of which must have name and value attributes.
trans-unit.target: GtkBuildable接口的GtkLevelBar实现支持自定义的<offsets>元素，该元素可以包含任意数量的<offset>元素，每个元素都必须具有名称和值属性。

trans-unit.source: The GtkListBox implementation of the GtkBuildable interface supports setting a child as the placeholder by specifying “placeholder” as the “type” attribute of a <child> element. See gtk_list_box_set_placeholder() for info.
trans-unit.target: GtkBuildable接口的GtkListBox实现支持通过将“ placeholder”指定为<child>元素的“ type”属性来将子级设置为占位符。有关信息，请参见 gtk_list_box_set_placeholder() 。

trans-unit.source: The GtkListStore implementation of the GtkBuildable interface allows to specify the model columns with a <columns> element that may contain multiple <column> elements, each specifying one model column. The “type” attribute specifies the data type for the column.
trans-unit.target: GtkBuildable接口的GtkListStore实现允许使用<columns>元素指定模型列，该元素可能包含多个<column>元素，每个元素指定一个模型列。“类型”属性指定列的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The GtkMessageDialog implementation of the GtkBuildable interface exposes the message area as an internal child with the name “message_area”.
trans-unit.target: GtkBuildable接口的GtkMessageDialog实现将消息区域作为内部子项公开，名称为“ message_area”。

trans-unit.source: The GtkNotebook implementation of the GtkBuildable interface supports placing children into tabs by specifying “tab” as the “type” attribute of a <child> element. Note that the content of the tab must be created before the tab can be filled. A tab child can be specified without specifying a <child> type attribute.
trans-unit.target: 通过将“ tab”指定为<child>元素的“ type”属性，GtkBuildable接口的GtkNotebook实现支持将子级放置到选项卡中。请注意，必须先创建选项卡的内容，然后才能填充选项卡。可以在不指定<child> type属性的情况下指定tab子项。

trans-unit.source: The GtkOverlay implementation of the GtkBuildable interface supports placing a child as an overlay by specifying “overlay” as the “type” attribute of a <child> element.
trans-unit.target: GtkBuildable接口的GtkOverlay实现支持通过将“ overlay”指定为 <child> 元素的“ type”属性来支持将子级放置为叠加层。

trans-unit.source: The GtkPageSetup to use.
The GtkPrintSettings used for initializing the dialog.
The GtkPrintUnixDialog implementation of the GtkBuildable interface exposes its notebook internal children with the name “notebook”.
trans-unit.target: GtkBuildable接口的GtkPrintUnixDialog实现使用名称“ notebook”公开其 notebook 内部子代。

trans-unit.source: The GtkPrinter which is selected.
The GtkRevealer widget is a container which animates the transition of its child from invisible to visible.
trans-unit.target: GtkRevealer widget是一个容器,它可以将其子节点从不可见过渡到可见。

trans-unit.source: The GtkShortcutManager interface is used to implement shortcut scopes.
trans-unit.target: GtkShortcutManager接口用于实现快捷键作用域。

trans-unit.source: The GtkStack widget is a container which only shows one of its children at a time. In contrast to GtkNotebook, GtkStack does not provide a means for users to change the visible child. Instead, the GtkStackSwitcher widget can be used with GtkStack to provide this functionality.
trans-unit.target: GtkStack小部件是一个容器，一次仅显示其一个子级。与GtkNotebook相比，GtkStack没有为用户提供一种更改可见子级的方法。而是可以将GtkStackSwitcher小部件与GtkStack一起使用以提供此功能。

trans-unit.source: The GtkStackSwitcher widget acts as a controller for a GtkStack; it shows a row of buttons to switch between the various pages of the associated stack widget.
trans-unit.target: 所述GtkStackSwitcher插件充当一个控制器GtkStack ; 它显示了一行按钮，可在相关堆栈小部件的各个页面之间进行切换。

trans-unit.source: The GtkStringList implementation of the GtkBuildable interface supports adding items directly using the <items> element and specifying <item> elements for each item. Each <item> element supports the regular translation attributes “translatable”, “context” and “comments”.
trans-unit.target: GtkBuildable接口的GtkStringList实现支持直接使用<items>元素添加项目，并为每个项目指定<item>元素。每个<item>元素都支持常规翻译属性“ translateable”，“ context”和“ comments”。

trans-unit.source: The GtkTextTagTable implementation of the GtkBuildable interface supports adding tags by specifying “tag” as the “type” attribute of a <child> element.
trans-unit.target: GtkBuildable接口的GtkTextTagTable实现支持通过将“标签”指定为<child>元素的“ type”属性来添加标签。

trans-unit.source: The GtkTreeStore implementation of the GtkBuildable interface allows to specify the model columns with a <columns> element that may contain multiple <column> elements, each specifying one model column. The “type” attribute specifies the data type for the column.
trans-unit.target: GtkBuildable接口的GtkTreeStore实现允许使用<columns>元素指定模型列，该元素可能包含多个<column>元素，每个元素指定一个模型列。“类型”属性指定列的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The GtkTreeView implementation of the GtkBuildable interface accepts GtkTreeViewColumn objects as <child> elements and exposes the internal GtkTreeSelection in UI definitions.
trans-unit.target: GtkBuildable接口的GtkTreeView实现接受GtkTreeViewColumn对象作为<child>元素，并在UI定义中公开内部GtkTreeSelection。

trans-unit.source: The GtkTreeViewColumn object represents a visible column in a GtkTreeView widget. It allows to set properties of the column header, and functions as a holding pen for the cell renderers which determine how the data in the column is displayed.
trans-unit.target: GtkTreeViewColumn对象表示GtkTreeView小部件中的可见列。它允许设置列标题的属性，并用作单元格渲染器的握笔，该渲染器确定如何显示列中的数据。

trans-unit.source: The GtkViewport will start scrolling content only if allocated less than the child widget’s minimum size in a given orientation.
trans-unit.target: 只有在指定方向上分配的大小小于子小部件的最小大小时，GtkViewport才会开始滚动内容。

trans-unit.source: The GtkWidget implementation of the GtkBuildable interface supports a custom elements to specify various aspects of widgets that are not directly expressed as properties.
trans-unit.target: GtkBuildable接口的GtkWidget实现支持自定义元素，以指定未直接表示为属性的小部件的各个方面。

trans-unit.source: The GtkWindow implementation of the GtkBuildable interface supports setting a child as the titlebar by specifying “titlebar” as the “type” attribute of a <child> element.
trans-unit.target: GtkBuildable接口的GtkWindow实现支持通过将“ titlebar”指定为<child>元素的“ type”属性来将子级设置为titlebar。

trans-unit.source: The ID of a GtkApplicationWindow can be retrieved with gtk_application_window_get_id().
The ID of the object to preview. If not specified, gtk4-builder-tool will choose a suitable object on its own.
trans-unit.target: 要预览的对象的ID.如果没有指定,gtk4-builder-tool会自己选择合适的对象.如果没有指定,gtk4-builder-tool会自己选择一个合适的对象.

trans-unit.source: The IO priority.
The MIT/X11 standard license
The Mozilla Public License, version 2.0
The URI bound to a GtkLinkButton can be set specifically using gtk_link_button_set_uri(), and retrieved using gtk_link_button_get_uri().
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 gtk_link_button_set_uri() 专门设置绑定到GtkLinkBut​​ton的URI ，然后使用 gtk_link_button_get_uri() 检索。

trans-unit.source: The URI bound to this button.
The URL for the link to the website of the program. This should be a string starting with "http://.
trans-unit.target: 链接到程序网站的URL。应该是以 "http://"开头的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode character at this iterator is returned. (Equivalent to operator* on a C++ iterator.) If the element at this iterator is a non-character element, such as an image embedded in the buffer, the Unicode “unknown” character 0xFFFC is returned. If invoked on the end iterator, zero is returned; zero is not a valid Unicode character. So you can write a loop which ends when gtk_text_iter_get_char() returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 返回此迭代器的Unicode字符。（等效于C ++迭代器上的operator *。）如果此迭代器上的元素是非字符元素（例如，缓冲区中嵌入的图像），则返回Unicode“未知”字符0xFFFC。如果在最终迭代器上调用，则返回零；否则返回0。零不是有效的Unicode字符。因此，您可以编写一个循环，该循环在 gtk_text_iter_get_char() 返回0时结束。

trans-unit.source: The VFL grammar is:

The Visual Format Language describes all the constraints on a row or column, typically starting from the leading edge towards the trailing one. Each element of the layout is composed by "views", which identify a GtkConstraintTarget.
trans-unit.target: 视觉格式语言描述了行或列上的所有约束，通常从前沿到尾随约束。布局的每个元素都由“视图”组成，这些视图标识了GtkConstraintTarget。

trans-unit.source: The Visual Format Language is based on Apple's AutoLayout VFL.
The Win32 GDK backend can be influenced with some additional environment variables.
trans-unit.target: Win32 GDK后台可以通过一些额外的环境变量来影响。

trans-unit.source: The Windows port does not support asynchronous operation at all (this is unlikely to change). On other platforms, all actions except for GTK_PRINT_OPERATION_ACTION_EXPORT support asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Windows端口根本不支持异步操作（这不太可能改变）。在其他平台上，除了 GTK_PRINT_OPERATION_ACTION_EXPORT 之外的所有动作都支持异步操作。

trans-unit.source: The Windows port of GTK is an implementation of GDK (and therefore GTK) on top of the Win32 API. When compiling GTK on Windows, this backend is the default.
trans-unit.target: GTK的Windows移植是在Win32 API之上的GDK(也就是GTK)的实现。当在Windows上编译GTK时,这个后端是默认的。

trans-unit.source: The X coordinate, in widget allocation coordinates
trans-unit.target: X坐标,以小组件分配坐标为基准

trans-unit.source: The X server is in charge of managing resources, processing drawing requests, and dispatching events such as keyboard and mouse events to interested applications. So client applications can ask the X server to create a window, draw a circle, or move windows around.
trans-unit.target: X服务器负责管理资源,处理绘图请求,并将键盘和鼠标事件等事件调度给感兴趣的应用程序。所以客户端应用程序可以要求X服务器创建一个窗口,画一个圆,或者移动窗口。

trans-unit.source: The XDG sound theme to use for event sounds.
trans-unit.target: XDG声音主题用于事件声音。

trans-unit.source: The XML format understood by GtkBuilder for GMenuModel consists of a toplevel <menu> element, which contains one or more <item> elements. Each <item> element contains <attribute> and <link> elements with a mandatory name attribute. <link> elements have the same content model as <menu>. Instead of <link name="submenu> or <link name="section">, you can use <submenu> or <section> elements.
trans-unit.target: GtkBuilder针对GMenuModel理解的XML格式由顶级 <menu> 元素组成，该元素包含一个或多个 <item> 元素。每个 <item> 元素都包含具有必需name属性的 <attribute> 和 <link> 元素。 <link> 元素具有与 <menu> 相同的内容模型。可以使用 <submenu> 或 <section> 元素来代替 <link name="submenu> 或 <link name="section"> 。

trans-unit.source: The XML which is contained inside the <template> tag behaves as if it were added to the <object> tag defining widget itself. You may set properties on widget by inserting <property> tags into the <template> tag, and also add <child> tags to add children and extend widget in the normal way you would with <object> tags.
trans-unit.target: 包含在<template>标记内的XML的行为就像是将其添加到定义 widget 本身的<object>标记中一样。您可以通过在<template>标记中插入<property>标记来设置 widget 的属性，还可以添加<child>标记来添加子代并以与<object>标记相同的方式扩展 widget 。

trans-unit.source: The Y coordinate, in widget allocation coordinates
trans-unit.target: Y座标,在小组件分配坐标中

trans-unit.source: The acceleration rate when you hold down a button or key.
trans-unit.target: 按住按钮或键时的加速率。

trans-unit.source: The acceleration rate when you hold down a button.
The accelerator that self displays. See “accelerator” for the accepted syntax.
trans-unit.target: self 显示的加速器。有关可接受的语法，请参见“加速器”。

trans-unit.source: The accelerator(s) represented by this object. This property is used if “shortcut-type” is set to GTK_SHORTCUT_ACCELERATOR.
trans-unit.target: 此对象表示的加速器。如果将“快捷方式类型”设置为GTK_SHORTCUT_ACCELERATOR，则使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: The accepted strings are:

The accessibility API is mainly used to express semantics useful for assistive technologies, but it can also be used to hide elements. The canonical way to do so is to use the GTK_ACCESSIBLE_ROLE_PRESENTATION, which declares that a UI element is purely meant for presentation purposes, and as such it has no meaningful impact on the accessibility of the interface.
trans-unit.target: 可访问性API主要用于表达对辅助技术有用的语义，但也可以用于隐藏元素。规范的方法是使用 GTK_ACCESSIBLE_ROLE_PRESENTATION ，它声明UI元素纯粹是为了表示目的，因此对接口的可访问性没有任何实质性影响。

trans-unit.source: The accessible role cannot be changed once set.
trans-unit.target: 可访问的角色一经设置就无法更改。

trans-unit.source: The accessible role for a GtkAccessible implementation.
The accessible role of the given GtkAccessible implementation.
trans-unit.target: 给定GtkAccessible实现的可访问角色。

trans-unit.source: The accessible role used by the AT context.
trans-unit.target: AT上下文使用的可访问角色。

trans-unit.source: The action is the only action that can be activated. If this flag is not set, a future activation may select a different action.
trans-unit.target: 该动作是唯一可以激活的动作。如果不设置该标志,今后的激活可选择不同的行动。

trans-unit.source: The action signal for the Escape binding.
The action that gets activated by this shortcut.
trans-unit.target: 被这个快捷方式激活的动作。

trans-unit.source: The action that will be activated upon triggering.
trans-unit.target: 触发后将被激活的动作。

trans-unit.source: The action widget with the given pack_type or NULL when this action widget has not been set.
trans-unit.target: 动作小部件与给定 pack_type 或 NULL 时，这个动作小部件尚未确定。

trans-unit.source: The action will be enabled or disabled depending on whether the selected font has any features or axes.
trans-unit.target: 该操作将根据所选字体是否具有任何特征或轴而被启用或禁用。

trans-unit.source: The action will be looked up in action groups that are found among the widgets ancestors. Most commonly, these will be the actions with the “win.” or “app.” prefix that are associated with the GtkApplicationWindow or GtkApplication, but other action groups that are added with gtk_widget_insert_action_group() will be consulted as well.
trans-unit.target: 将在小部件祖先之间找到的操作组中查找该操作。最常见的是，这些都是带有“胜利”的行为。或“应用”。与GtkApplicationWindow或GtkApplication关联的前缀，但是也会查询与 gtk_widget_insert_action_group() 添加的其他操作组。

trans-unit.source: The actions belonging to rings/strips will be activated with a parameter of type G_VARIANT_TYPE_DOUBLE bearing the value of the given axis, it is required that those are made stateful and accepting this GVariantType.
trans-unit.target: 属于环/带的动作将通过带有给定轴值的类型为 G_VARIANT_TYPE_DOUBLE 的参数激活，要求将这些动作设为有状态并接受该GVariantType。

trans-unit.source: The actions that are supported by drag operations from the source.
trans-unit.target: 源的拖动操作所支持的动作。

trans-unit.source: The activate action.
The activate-on-single-click property specifies whether the "item-activated" signal will be emitted after a single click.
trans-unit.target: 单次点击激活属性指定了单次点击后是否会发出 "项目激活 "信号。

trans-unit.source: The activate-on-single-click property specifies whether the "row-activated" signal will be emitted after a single click.
trans-unit.target: 单次点击激活属性指定了单次点击后是否会发出 "行激活 "信号。

trans-unit.source: The active window is the one that was most recently focused (within the application). This window may not have the focus at the moment if another application has it — this is just the most recently-focused window within this application.
trans-unit.target: 活动窗口是最近一次（在应用程序内）关注的窗口。如果另一个应用程序拥有此窗口，则此窗口可能当前没有焦点-这只是该应用程序中最近关注的窗口。

trans-unit.source: The actual widgets used for displaying those widgets is provided by you.
trans-unit.target: 用于显示这些小部件的实际小部件由您提供。

trans-unit.source: The actual work is usually done via GtkShortcutController, which decides if and when to activate a shortcut. Using that controller directly however is rarely necessary as various higher level convenience APIs exist on GtkWidgets that make it easier to use shortcuts in GTK.
trans-unit.target: 实际的工作通常是通过GtkShortcutController完成的，后者决定是否以及何时激活快捷方式。但是，直接使用该控制器几乎是不必要的，因为GtkWidgets上存在各种更高级别的便捷API，这些API使得在GTK中更容易使用快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: The adjustment that holds the value of the spin button.
trans-unit.target: 保持旋转按钮数值的调整。

trans-unit.source: The adjustment that holds the value of the spinbutton. This must be non-NULL for the cell renderer to be editable.
trans-unit.target: 调整将保留旋转按钮的值。为了使单元格渲染器可编辑，此参数必须为非 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: The adjustments have to be in pixel units and in the same coordinate system as the allocation for immediate children of the box.
trans-unit.target: 调整必须以像素为单位,并与框的直系子代的分配在同一坐标系中。

trans-unit.source: The alignment of the lines in the text of the label relative to each other. This does NOT affect the alignment of the label within its allocation. See GtkLabel:xalign for that.
trans-unit.target: 标签文本中各行相对的对齐方式。这不影响标签在其分配中的对齐方式,请参见GtkLabel:xalign。参见GtkLabel:xalign。

trans-unit.source: The alignment, which is between [0.0 and 1.0] inclusive.

trans-unit.source: The application menu looks like this:
The application shows the source code for each example, as well as other used resources, such as ui files and icons.
trans-unit.target: 该应用程序显示了每个例子的源代码,以及其他使用的资源,如ui文件和图标。

trans-unit.source: The application shows widgets in different, typical combinations and states.
trans-unit.target: 该应用程序在不同的、典型的组合和状态下显示小组件。

trans-unit.source: The application will be kept alive for at least as long as it has any windows associated with it (see g_application_hold() for a way to keep it alive without windows).
trans-unit.target: 该应用程序将至少在与窗口相关联的情况下一直处于活动状态（请参见 g_application_hold() 以了解在没有Windows的情况下保持活动状态的方法）。

trans-unit.source: The arguments must match the actions expected parameter type, as returned by g_action_get_parameter_type().
trans-unit.target: 参数必须与 g_action_get_parameter_type() 返回的action预期参数类型匹配。

trans-unit.source: The arguments passed to the activation
The aspect ratio of the text caret.
The associated GdkDisplay.
The attribute of the “source” read by the constraint.
The attribute of the “target” set by the constraint.

The attributes are updated every time a UI element's state changes in a way that should be reflected by assistive technologies. For instance, if a GtkWidget visibility changes, the GTK_ACCESSIBLE_STATE_HIDDEN state will also change to reflect the “visible” property.
trans-unit.target: 每次UI元素的状态更改时，都会以辅助技术应反映的方式更新属性。例如，如果GtkWidget可见性更改，则 GTK_ACCESSIBLE_STATE_HIDDEN 状态也将更改以反映“ visible”属性。

trans-unit.source: The attributes can also enhance the UI:

The attributes set with this function will be applied and merged with any other attributes previously effected by way of the “use-underline” or “use-markup” properties. While it is not recommended to mix markup strings with manually set attributes, if you must; know that the attributes will be applied to the label after the markup string is parsed.
trans-unit.target: 通过此功能设置的属性将被应用，并与先前通过“ use-underline”或“ use-markup”属性影响的任何其他属性合并。虽然不建议您将标记字符串与手动设置的属性混合使用，但必须这样做；知道解析标记字符串后，属性将应用于标签。

trans-unit.source: The attributes should be in attribute/column order, as in gtk_cell_layout_add_attribute(). All existing attributes are removed, and replaced with the new attributes.
trans-unit.target: 属性应按照 gtk_cell_layout_add_attribute() 中的属性/列顺序。删除所有现有属性，并用新属性替换。

The attributes to query with.
The attributes to query.
The authoring practices are aimed at application developers, as well as developers of GUI elements based on GTK.
trans-unit.target: 编写实践的对象是应用程序开发人员,以及基于GTK的GUI元素开发人员。

trans-unit.source: The authors of the program, as a NULL-terminated array of strings. Each string may contain email addresses and URLs, which will be displayed as links, see the introduction for more details.
trans-unit.target: 程序的作者，以 NULL 终止的字符串数组。每个字符串可能包含电子邮件地址和URL，它们将显示为链接，有关更多详细信息，请参见简介。

trans-unit.target: 当前正在由 entry 使用的辅助完成对象。

trans-unit.source: The available routines for drawing are documented on the GDK Drawing Primitives page and the cairo documentation.
trans-unit.target: 可用的绘图例程在 GDK 绘图基元页面和 cairo 文档中进行了说明。

trans-unit.source: The backend state that is controlled by the switch. See “state-set” for details.
trans-unit.target: 交换机控制的后端状态。有关详细信息，请参见“状态集”。

trans-unit.source: The baseline of a widget
The baseline of the child, or -1

The baseline position affects only horizontal boxes with at least one baseline aligned child. If there is more vertical space available than requested, and the baseline is not allocated by the parent then the given position is used to allocate the baseline within the extra space available.
trans-unit.target: 基线位置仅影响具有至少一个基线对齐子级的水平框。如果可用的垂直空间多于请求的空间，并且父级未分配基线，则使用给定的 position 在可用的额外空间内分配基线。

trans-unit.source: The basic API is similar to GtkTreeModelSort. For an example on its usage, see the section on GtkTreeModelSort.
trans-unit.target: 基本API与GtkTreeModelSort相似。有关其用法的示例，请参见GtkTreeModelSort的部分。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of a checkbutton in a group is also commonly known as a 'radio button'.
trans-unit.target: 组中的复选按钮的行为通常也被称为 "单选按钮"。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of selection models - ie which items they allow selecting and what effect this has on other items - is completely up to the selection model. As such, single-selections, multi-selections or sharing selection state between different selection models and/or views is possible. The selection state of an item is exposed in the listitem via the “selected” property.
trans-unit.target: 选择模型的行为（即，它们允许选择哪些项目以及这对其他项目有什么影响）完全取决于选择模型。这样，可以在不同的选择模型和/或视图之间进行单选，复选或共享选择状态。项目的选择状态通过“ selected”属性显示在列表项中。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of the event controller can be modified by the flags given at creation time, or modified at a later point through gtk_event_controller_scroll_set_flags() (e.g. because the scrolling conditions of the widget changed).
trans-unit.target: 可以通过在创建时给定的标志来修改事件控制器的行为，也可以在以后通过 gtk_event_controller_scroll_set_flags() 修改事件控制器的行为（例如，因为小部件的滚动条件已更改）。

trans-unit.source: The behaviour of GtkGrid when several children occupy the same grid cell is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 当多个子代占据同一个网格单元时,GtkGrid的行为是未定义的。

trans-unit.source: The cell area handles events, focus navigation, drawing and size requests and allocations for a given row of data.
trans-unit.target: 单元格区域处理给定数据行的事件、焦点导航、绘图和尺寸请求及分配。

trans-unit.source: The cell can be clicked.
The cell can be edited or otherwise modified.
trans-unit.target: 可对单元格进行编辑或其他修改。

trans-unit.source: The cell in the area that currently has focus
trans-unit.target: 当前有焦点的区域的单元格

trans-unit.source: The cell in the area that is currently edited
trans-unit.target: 当前编辑区域的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The cell is currently selected, and probably has a selection colored background to render to.
trans-unit.target: 当前被选中的单元格,可能有一个选择的彩色背景渲染到。

trans-unit.source: The cell is drawn in an insensitive manner
trans-unit.target: 单元格的绘制方式不敏感。

trans-unit.source: The cell is in a row that can be expanded
trans-unit.target: 单元格在一个可以展开的行中。

trans-unit.source: The cell is in a row that is expanded
trans-unit.target: 单元格所在的行是展开的

trans-unit.source: The cell is in a sorted row
trans-unit.target: 单元格在一个排序的行中

trans-unit.source: The cell is in the focus row.

The cell is just for display and cannot be interacted with. Note that this doesn’t mean that eg. the row being drawn can’t be selected -- just that a particular element of it cannot be individually modified.
trans-unit.target: 该单元仅用于显示，不能与之交互。请注意，这并不意味着例如。无法选择要绘制的行-只是不能单独修改其中的特定元素。

The center of a widget, on the horizontal axis
trans-unit.target: 小组件的中心,在水平轴上。

trans-unit.target: 小组件的中心,在垂直轴上。

trans-unit.source: The center widget is centered regarding the full width of the layout's.
trans-unit.target: 中心小部件以布局的整个宽度为中心。

trans-unit.source: The changed signal is emitted when the active item is changed. The can be due to the user selecting a different item from the list, or due to a call to gtk_combo_box_set_active_iter(). It will also be emitted while typing into the entry of a combo box with an entry.

The column view also supports interactive resizing and reordering of columns, via Drag-and-Drop of the column headers. This can be enabled or disabled with the “reorderable” and “resizable” properties.
trans-unit.target: 列视图还支持通过列标题的拖放来交互式调整列的大小和重新排序。可以使用“可重新排序”和“可调整大小”属性来启用或禁用此功能。

trans-unit.source: The column view displaying self .

The column view supports sorting that can be customized by the user by clicking on column headers. To set this up, the GtkSorter returned by gtk_column_view_get_sorter() must be attached to a sort model for the data that the view is showing, and the columns must have sorters attached to them by calling gtk_column_view_column_set_sorter(). The initial sort order can be set with gtk_column_view_sort_by_column().
trans-unit.target: 列视图支持排序，用户可以通过单击列标题来自定义排序。要这样设置，则GtkSorter返回由 gtk_column_view_get_sorter() 必须连接到用于数据的排序模型，该视图被示出，并且列必须具有通过调用连接到它们分拣机 gtk_column_view_column_set_sorter() 。可以使用 gtk_column_view_sort_by_column() 设置初始排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: The column's title.
The column-spacing property specifies the space which is inserted between the columns of the icon view.
trans-unit.target: 列距属性指定了图标视图各列之间插入的空间。

trans-unit.source: The columns property contains the number of the columns in which the items should be displayed. If it is -1, the number of columns will be chosen automatically to fill the available area.
trans-unit.target: 列属性包含显示项目的列数。如果是-1,则会自动选择列数来填充可用区域。

trans-unit.source: The combo cell renderer takes care of adding a text cell renderer to the combo box and sets it to display the column specified by its “text-column” property. Further properties of the combo box can be set in a handler for the “editing-started” signal.
trans-unit.target: 组合单元格渲染器负责将文本单元格渲染器添加到组合框，并将其设置为显示由其“ text-column”属性指定的列。可以在处理程序中为“开始编辑”信号设置组合框的其他属性。

trans-unit.source: The contents child node always gets the .background style class and the popover itself gets the .menu style class if the popover is menu-like (i.e. GtkPopoverMenu).

trans-unit.source: The contents of box are cleared and then filled with widgets that represent items from model . box is updated whenever model changes. If model is NULL, box is left empty.
trans-unit.target: 清除 box 的内容，然后填充代表 model 项目的小部件。每当 model 更改时，该 box 就会更新。如果 model 为 NULL ，则 box 为空。

trans-unit.source: The contents of a widget often need to be partially or fully redrawn, e.g. when another window is moved and uncovers part of the widget, or when the window containing it is resized. It is also possible to explicitly cause part or all of the widget to be redrawn, by calling gtk_widget_queue_draw() or its variants. GTK takes care of most of the details by providing a ready-to-use cairo context to the ::draw signal handler.
trans-unit.target: 小部件的内容通常需要部分或全部重绘，例如，当另一个窗口被移动并覆盖了小部件的一部分时，或者当包含小部件的窗口被调整大小时。通过调用 gtk_widget_queue_draw() 或其变体，也可以显式地使部分或全部窗口小部件重新绘制。 GTK通过为:: draw信号处理程序提供现成的cairo上下文来处理大多数细节。

trans-unit.source: The controller can be set up to emit motion for either/both vertical and horizontal scroll events through GTK_EVENT_CONTROLLER_SCROLL_VERTICAL, GTK_EVENT_CONTROLLER_SCROLL_HORIZONTAL and GTK_EVENT_CONTROLLER_SCROLL_BOTH_AXES. If any axis is disabled, the respective “scroll” delta will be 0. Vertical scroll events will be translated to horizontal motion for the devices incapable of horizontal scrolling.
trans-unit.target: 可以将控制器设置为通过GTK_EVENT_CONTROLLER_SCROLL_VERTICAL，GTK_EVENT_CONTROLLER_SCROLL_HORIZONTAL和GTK_EVENT_CONTROLLER_SCROLL_BOTH_AXES发出垂直和水平滚动事件的运动。如果禁用了任何轴，则相应的“滚动”增量将为0。对于无法进行水平滚动的设备，垂直滚动事件将转换为水平运动。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates for (x , y ) must be in widget coordinates, so (0, 0) is assumed to be the top left of widget 's content area.

trans-unit.source: The created buttons are connected to actions found in the action groups that are accessible from the parent widget. This includes the GtkApplicationWindow to which the popover belongs. Actions can also be added using gtk_widget_insert_action_group() on the parent widget or on any of its parent widgets.
trans-unit.target: 创建的按钮连接到可从父窗口小部件访问的操作组中找到的操作。这包括弹出框所属的GtkApplicationWindow。也可以在父窗口小部件或其任何父窗口小部件上使用 gtk_widget_insert_action_group() 添加操作。

trans-unit.source: The currently-selected text in buffer is the region between the “selection_bound” and “insert” marks. If “selection_bound” and “insert” are in the same place, then there is no current selection. gtk_text_buffer_get_selection_bounds() is another convenient function for handling the selection, if you just want to know whether there’s a selection and what its bounds are.
trans-unit.target: buffer 当前选择的文本是“ selection_bound”和“ insert”标记之间的区域。如果“ selection_bound”和“ insert”在同一位置，则没有当前选择。 gtk_text_buffer_get_selection_bounds() 是用于处理选择的另一个便捷函数，如果您仅想知道是否存在选择及其边界。

trans-unit.source: The cursor is displayed before the character with the given (base 0) index in the contents of the editable. The value must be less than or equal to the number of characters in the editable. A value of -1 indicates that the position should be set after the last character of the editable. Note that position is in characters, not in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 在可编辑内容中，光标显示在具有给定索引（基数0）的字符之前。该值必须小于或等于可编辑字符数。值-1表示位置应设置在可编辑的最后一个字符之后。请注意， position 以字符为单位，而不是以字节为单位。

trans-unit.source: The cursor used by widget . See gtk_widget_set_cursor() for details.
trans-unit.target: widget 使用的光标。有关详细信息，请参见 gtk_widget_set_cursor() 。

trans-unit.source: The custom label, or NULL for the default. This string is owned by GTK+ and should not be modified or freed.
trans-unit.target: 自定义标签，默认为 NULL 。该字符串归GTK +所有，不得修改或释放。

trans-unit.source: The custom preview implementation can use gtk_print_operation_preview_is_selected() and gtk_print_operation_preview_render_page() to find pages which are selected for print and render them. The preview must be finished by calling gtk_print_operation_preview_end_preview() (typically in response to the user clicking a close button).
trans-unit.target: 定制预览实现可以使用 gtk_print_operation_preview_is_selected() 和 gtk_print_operation_preview_render_page() 来查找选择打印并渲染的页面。必须通过调用 gtk_print_operation_preview_end_preview() 来完成预览（通常是响应于用户单击关闭按钮）。

trans-unit.source: The data that is offered by drag operations from this source, in the form of a GdkContentProvider.
trans-unit.target: 来自此源的拖动操作以GdkContentProvider的形式提供的数据。

trans-unit.source: The date that is currently displayed can be altered with gtk_calendar_select_day().
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 gtk_calendar_select_day() 更改当前显示的日期。

trans-unit.source: The decoration layout for buttons. If this property is not set, the “gtk-decoration-layout” setting is used.
trans-unit.target: 按钮的装饰布局。如果未设置此属性，则使用“ gtk-decoration-layout”设置。

trans-unit.source: The decoration layout for window buttons. If this property is not set, the “gtk-decoration-layout” setting is used.
trans-unit.target: 窗口按钮的装饰布局。如果未设置此属性，则使用“ gtk-decoration-layout”设置。

trans-unit.source: The default ::keynav-failed handler returns FALSE for GTK_DIR_TAB_FORWARD and GTK_DIR_TAB_BACKWARD. For the other values of GtkDirectionType it returns TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 失败的默认:: keynav处理程序对于 GTK_DIR_TAB_FORWARD 和 GTK_DIR_TAB_BACKWARD 返回 FALSE 。对于GtkDirectionType的其他值，它返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: The default focus() vfunc for a widget should return TRUE if moving in direction left the focus on a focusable location inside that widget, and FALSE if moving in direction moved the focus outside the widget. If returning TRUE, widgets normally call gtk_widget_grab_focus() to place the focus accordingly; if returning FALSE, they don’t modify the current focus location.
trans-unit.target: 默认 focus() vfunc对微件应该返回 TRUE ，如果在移动 direction 左边的焦点上插件内的可聚焦的位置，并且 FALSE 如果在移动 direction 移动的部件以外的焦点。如果返回 TRUE ，则小部件通常会调用 gtk_widget_grab_focus() 来相应地放置焦点；如果返回 FALSE ，则不会修改当前焦点位置。

trans-unit.source: The default IO priority is G_PRIORITY_DEFAULT, which is higher than the GTK redraw priority. If you are loading a lot of directories in parallel, lowering it to something like G_PRIORITY_DEFAULT_IDLE may increase responsiveness.

trans-unit.target: 可以通过“ gtk-im-module” GtkSettings属性以编程方式设置默认输入法。另外，您可以按照运行GTK应用程序中的说明设置GTK_IM_MODULE环境变量。

trans-unit.source: The default interval of values is between zero and one, but it’s possible to modify the interval using gtk_level_bar_set_min_value() and gtk_level_bar_set_max_value(). The value will be always drawn in proportion to the admissible interval, i.e. a value of 15 with a specified interval between 10 and 20 is equivalent to a value of 0.5 with an interval between 0 and 1. When GTK_LEVEL_BAR_MODE_DISCRETE is used, the bar level is rendered as a finite number of separated blocks instead of a single one. The number of blocks that will be rendered is equal to the number of units specified by the admissible interval.
trans-unit.target: 值的默认间隔在零到一之间，但是可以使用 gtk_level_bar_set_min_value() 和 gtk_level_bar_set_max_value() 修改间隔。该值将始终与允许间隔成比例绘制，即指定间隔为10到20的值15等于间隔为0到1的值0.5。当使用GTK_LEVEL_BAR_MODE_DISCRETE时，条形级别为呈现为有限数量的独立块，而不是单个块。将要渲染的块数等于允许间隔指定的单位数。

trans-unit.source: The default is GTK_CORNER_TOP_LEFT, meaning the child is in the top left, with the scrollbars underneath and to the right. Other values in GtkCornerType are GTK_CORNER_TOP_RIGHT, GTK_CORNER_BOTTOM_LEFT, and GTK_CORNER_BOTTOM_RIGHT.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 GTK_CORNER_TOP_LEFT ，这意味着该子项位于左上方，滚动条位于右下方。GtkCornerType中的其他值是 GTK_CORNER_TOP_RIGHT ， GTK_CORNER_BOTTOM_LEFT 和 GTK_CORNER_BOTTOM_RIGHT 。

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is FALSE to avoid downloading huge amounts of data by accident. For example, if somebody drags a full document of gigabytes of text from a text editor across a widget with a preloading drop target, this data will be downloaded, even if the data is ultimately dropped elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: 该属性的默认值为 FALSE ,以避免意外下载大量数据。例如，如果某人从文本编辑器中将一个完整的千兆字节文本的完整文档拖到具有预加载放下目标的小部件上，则即使最终将数据放到其他位置，也将下载此数据。

trans-unit.source: The default value is GTK_OVERFLOW_VISIBLE.

The default value of this environment variable is 1. If changed to 0, this disables the default use of client-side decorations on GTK windows, thus making the window manager responsible for drawing the decorations of windows that do not have a custom titlebar widget.

trans-unit.source: The draw function is normally called when a drawing area first comes onscreen, or when it’s covered by another window and then uncovered. You can also force a redraw by adding to the “damage region” of the drawing area’s window using gtk_widget_queue_draw(). This will cause the drawing area to call the draw function again.
trans-unit.target: 通常在以下情况下会调用绘图功能：首先在屏幕上显示绘图区域，或者当它被另一个窗口覆盖然后被隐藏时。您还可以使用 gtk_widget_queue_draw() 将其添加到绘图区域窗口的“损坏区域”，以强制重新绘制。这将导致绘图区域再次调用绘图功能。

trans-unit.source: The draw function will be called during the drawing stage of GTK. In the drawing stage it is not allowed to change properties of any GTK widgets or call any functions that would cause any properties to be changed. You should restrict yourself exclusively to drawing your contents in the draw function.
trans-unit.target: 绘制函数将在GTK的绘制阶段被调用。在绘制阶段不允许改变任何GTK部件的属性或调用任何会导致任何属性被改变的函数。你应该限制自己在绘制函数中专门绘制你的内容。

trans-unit.source: The drop controller is not able to accept drops, use GtkDropTarget for that purpose.

trans-unit.source: The easiest way to do a modal message dialog is to use the GTK_DIALOG_MODAL flag, which will call gtk_window_set_modal() internally. The dialog will prevent interaction with the parent window until it's hidden or destroyed. You can use the “response” signal to know when the user dismissed the dialog.
trans-unit.target: 进行模态消息对话框的最简单方法是使用 GTK_DIALOG_MODAL 标志，该标志将在内部调用 gtk_window_set_modal() 。该对话框将阻止与父窗口的交互，直到将其隐藏或销毁为止。您可以使用“响应”信号来了解用户何时关闭对话框。

trans-unit.source: The effective sensitivity of a widget is however determined by both its own and its parent widget’s sensitivity. See gtk_widget_is_sensitive().
trans-unit.target: 但是，小部件的有效灵敏度取决于其自身及其父级小部件的灵敏度。参见 gtk_widget_is_sensitive() 。

The end tag matching the start tag for which this call was made is handled by the previous parser (which is given its own user_data) which is why gtk_buildable_parse_context_pop() is provided to allow "one last access" to the user_data provided to this function. In the case of error, the user_data provided here is passed directly to the error callback of the subparser and gtk_buildable_parse_context_pop() should not be called. In either case, if user_data was allocated then it ought to be freed from both of these locations.
trans-unit.target: 匹配此调用的开始标签的结束标签由先前的解析器（为其提供了自己的user_data）进行处理，这就是为什么提供 gtk_buildable_parse_context_pop() 来允许对该功能提供的 user_data 的“最后访问” 。如果发生错误，此处提供的 user_data 将直接传递到子解析器的错误回调，并且不应调用 gtk_buildable_parse_context_pop() 。在任何一种情况下，如果分配了 user_data ，则应将其从这两个位置中释放出来。

The estimate is the number of items that would still need to be sorted to finish the sorting operation if this was a linear algorithm. So this number is not related to how many items are already correctly sorted.
trans-unit.target: 估计值是指如果这是一种线性算法,还需要进行排序才能完成排序操作的物品数量。所以这个数字与已经正确排序的物品数量无关。

trans-unit.source: The event controller can also be forced to emit discrete events on all devices through GTK_EVENT_CONTROLLER_SCROLL_DISCRETE. This can be used to implement discrete actions triggered through scroll events (e.g. switching across combobox options).

trans-unit.source: The function.

The functions gtk_builder_get_object() and gtk_builder_get_objects() can be used to access the widgets in the interface by the names assigned to them inside the UI description. Toplevel windows returned by these functions will stay around until the user explicitly destroys them with gtk_window_destroy(). Other widgets will either be part of a larger hierarchy constructed by the builder (in which case you should not have to worry about their lifecycle), or without a parent, in which case they have to be added to some container to make use of them. Non-widget objects need to be reffed with g_object_ref() to keep them beyond the lifespan of the builder.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用功能 gtk_builder_get_object() 和 gtk_builder_get_objects() 通过UI描述内分配给它们的名称来访问界面中的窗口小部件。这些函数返回的顶级窗口将一直存在，直到用户使用 gtk_window_destroy() 明确销毁它们为止。其他窗口小部件将成为构建器构建的更大层次结构的一部分（在这种情况下，您不必担心它们的生命周期），或者不带父窗口小部件，在这种情况下，必须将它们添加到某个容器中才能使用它们。非小部件对象必须使用 g_object_ref() 清除，以使其超出构建器的寿命。

trans-unit.source: The functions and objects described here make working with GTK and GIO more convenient.
trans-unit.target: 这里描述的函数和对象使GTK和GIO的工作更加方便。

trans-unit.source: The fundamental concepts of an accessible widget are roles and attributes; each GTK control has a role, while its functionality is described by a set of attributes.
trans-unit.target: 可访问窗口小部件的基本概念是角色和属性；每个GTK控件都有其作用，而其功能由一组属性来描述。

trans-unit.source: The geometry management system will query a widget hierarchy in only one orientation at a time. When widgets are initially queried for their minimum sizes it is generally done in two initial passes in the GtkSizeRequestMode chosen by the toplevel.
trans-unit.target: 几何管理系统将一次仅在一个方向上查询微件层次结构。最初查询小部件的最小大小时，通常是在顶层选择的GtkSizeRequestMode中的两次初始传递中完成的。
